items.sentence: I hope that I can spend Thanksgiving with you.
We need to find out what we're supposed to do.
We need to find out when Tom plans to be here.
Tom often flirts with the girls he works with.
Tom has done everything he was supposed to do.
Tom lives in a room above his parents' garage.
Tom had always dreamed of living in Australia.
Tom and I don't live very close to each other.
I wonder where Tom will be tomorrow afternoon.
Tom wants to know the reason why he was fired.
